anally adverb
(MENTAL STATE)
informal in a way that relates to being too worried about being organized or tidy: He anally straightens all the pens so that they're exactly in line. My mum was anally tidy so that's how I grew up.
More examplesFewer examplesThe house is clean and tidy, but not anally so.Anyone who's never had a messy bedroom must be really anally obsessed.Why are you acting so anally about all the cushions being straight?
